body:
Comment 4: 
[]byte(str) is not a constant expression.  Without extensive optimisation, it must be
considered an operation that allocates a new block of memory each time it is evaluated. 
The compiler cannot in general materialize it. So I would expect the typechecker to
report that []byte("foo") has type []byte, and that "foo" has type untyped string and
constant value "foo".
